Text: Financial Liquidation Issues Cc In addition to the problem with Central June that I emailed you a followup note just a few minutes ago we also need help resolving the following In October there is a variance for NY for between the NGPrice and the IntraCentral books Per Phillip there should be an offset for this and there shouldnt be a variance In September there are the following variances that we need help identifying OilNGH ExoticT In August there is a variance for EW for Per Phillip this should be offset with leg and there should not be a variance Jeff Gossett is adamant about getting the financial liquidation variances cleared before next month and we really need your help resolving these Thanks Cathy

NGPL Lone Liquidations Cc Phillip I put together a spreadsheet to look at the lone liquidations we have on the summary pages that we will be presenting today and then looking at what is going to hit in the next month All the turnarounds you mentioned to me for January did happen but in total we booked another million of expense This spreadsheet lists the lone liquidations from November and December production down the far left column and ties to our current summary schedule I put the new liquidations from January production on the right I hope this is useful to you Thanks Cathy

Re Preliminary Central Summary GLJust to keep you posted The offsetting liquidations in revenue for these two deals was sitting in the West Fred file It looks West already took this to the desk so Theresa will get with Darren to reverse their take and reclass this to Central Thanks for your help with this Cathy Forwarded by Cathy SprowlsHOUECT on AM Phillip M Love AM To Cathy CT cc Subject Re Preliminary Central Summary GL the variances you have listed in january for lone liquidations for NNG QN this is a storage deal and should go with sitara and QO should go with We will have the same thing in February going the other way with these deals the sitara numbers there are respectively Shout with any questions This should explain about of the lone liquidation problem from January PL

Re Preliminary Central Summary GL Cc Phillip this liquidation looks like it relates to Reliant contract Sitara deal which was booked as a physical storage withdrawal for January production in the January GL I dont normally see liquidations for physical storage Is there anything else you can tell me about this Milton can you confirm that this is really physical storage Thanks Cathy Forwarded by Cathy SprowlsHOUECT on PM Phillip M Love AM To Cathy CT cc Subject Re Preliminary Central Summary GL same thing with the Reliant energy lone liq from january QI this is related to sitara there should be no liq var shout with any questions PL

Central June financial liquidation questions Cc Please just look at the transport piece below I already have an answer on NBB Thanks Cathy Forwarded by Cathy SprowlsHOUECT on PM From Cathy Sprowls PM To Jim CT cc Phillip M CT Subject Central June financial liquidation questions Jim There are two items in the June Central Fred file that we need help with NBB Phillip says this is not Centrals Can you take a look Transport Can you provide any detail for what is included here Thanks for your help Cathy

Central June financial liquidation questions Cc There are two items in the June Central Fred file that we need help with NBB Phillip says this is not Centrals Can you take a look Transport Can you provide any detail for what is included here Thanks for your help Cathy
Preliminary Central Summary GLHeres an advance look at the Central Summary for March GL Ill have all the detail to you later today Thanks Cathy

Current summary pagesIve been working on the Settlements forms and Ive updated the schedules again There were some adjustments to the Fred variances as well when I reclassed liquidations out of financial and into physical Since Im pretty much out of time here is the latest and most likely final schedule Cathy
Missing liquidations Cc In order to clear a purchase variance for WPS Energy Phillip is telling me I need the following liquidations that I dont see in the file can you help Q Q Q Thanks Cathy

Central Schedulesare updated schedules from our discussions this morning I think these have all the cell notes with the exception of the last few months synthetic storage detail I will get you that next Phillip Also I will bring you copies of the Engage payments for May Thanks Cathy

Liquidation questions Cc or Kam Jim Little booked some liquidation pmas in GL for production for Central region Im not able to tie these taggs to a Sitara deal so Im not sure what to do with them Can you help ND Consumers Gas revenue Jim says this should probably be reclassed to Ontario but I dont have any open issues related to Ontario and I dont know what the Sitara link is EC Enron Canada revenue The tagg references Sitara but when I try to open it I get an access denied message any clues what this is ND Enron Canada revenue I didnt see a Sitara reference on this tagg either He also booked a pma for of expense for Consumers on tagg NF but it looks to me like weve already booked this one in the original liquidation file so Ive asked him to research that one Thanks for your help Cathy

Enron Canada Ontario variancesand Kam I put together spreadsheets summarizing the variances for Enron Canada purchases and sales for the Ontario region for August and it looks like we have a similar situation to July in that there are two liquidations on the purchase side that dont reference any particular Sitara deal that are directly offset in the liquidations for Transcanada Pipeline sales If we net these two liquidations it significantly reduces both variances The Taggs are N and and NC and Thanks Cathy

October Fuel Adjustment Cc PST Phillip The open item related to fuel is for an increase of MMBTUs to ANR Pipeline There was a fuel adjustment in March reducing fuel by and reducing expense That revenue that was taken to the desk in April That fuel adjustment was reversed in a subsequent month and that is the expense that is on the back page currently I have copies of the VMREP reports as support Let me know if I need to get anything additional from Volume Management Thanks Cathy
